column4: i have port 25, 110, and 143 forwarded. squirrelmail connection refused by imap server. any reasons why?
ERROR: Connection dropped by IMAP server.
what's the IMAP server you are using?
and is it on one of those ports acidrain
yes it is on port 143. how to i get imap version?
acidraid not sure...  are you hosting your own mail server or are you trying to get squirrelmail to retrieve from a remote mail service (like pair networks or gmail or something)
i've only ever ran squirrelmail over SMTP
so you are suggesting i change squirrelmail port to 25?
also acidrain the other thing is that some ISPs if it's a home line may block some of those ports to prevent you from hosting mail and web servers
only if your mail server is set up for SMTP
but thats not the case here. i had a mail server up 5 months ago on a different box
mail is on 25. imap on 143. courier on 110
what are you using as the mail server tho?
SM is supposed to be using imap to authenticate to the smtp server
i guess it cannot do it in plain text?
give me a sec to read over some docs...  i havent done this in ages
